MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G11 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Gardner Street and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:50pm to carry out repairs on an underground cable fault near the Fortrose substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:50pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:35pm on Tuesday, 20 October 2020
